item.title: 美国矿山仍蕴藏着数百万吨铜，只要企业能开采出来
item.description:
由于关税威胁导致铜价飙升，弗里波特麦克莫兰公司、力拓公司和必和必拓公司等矿商正在进行硫化物浸出试验。【原文：

Freeport-McMoRan, Rio Tinto and BHP are among the miners testing sulfide leaching as tariff threats send copper prices soaring.

】

item.title: 哥伦比亚卫生危机持续发酵，患者无法获得药品
item.description:
波哥大和其他大城市的药房外每天都排起长队，业界和政府相互指责对方造成了日益严重的危机。【原文：

Long lines form daily outside medical dispensaries in Bogotá and other major cities, with industry and government blaming each other for the growing crisis.

】

item.title: 关税临近，股市看跌呼声渐高
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 05:49。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 05:49 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 部长称法国 2025 年经济增长预测将下调
item.description: 一位初级部长表示，法国政府将下调 2025 年的经济增长预期，而这距离最终确定预算还不到两个月。【原文：France’s government will revise down its growth forecast for 2025, less than two months after finalizing the budget, a junior minister said.】

item.title: 印度任命前世界银行经济学家古普塔为印度央行副行长
item.description: 印度任命前世界银行经济学家普纳姆-古普塔（Poonam Gupta）为央行副行长，在印度储备银行转向宽松货币政策设置的过程中担任这一重要职位。【原文：India named Poonam Gupta, a former World Bank economist, as a deputy governor at the central bank, filing up a key position as the Reserve Bank of India moves toward looser monetary policy settings.】

item.title: 意大利商界游说团认为 2025 年经济增长将放缓至 0.6
item.description: 据商业游说团体 Confindustria 称，受高昂的能源价格和美国关税上调预期的拖累，意大利经济今年将仅增长 0.6%。【原文：Italy’s economy will grow just 0.6% this year, weighed down by high energy prices and an expected increase in US tariffs, according to business lobby Confindustria.】

item.title: 华尔街交易员警告 S&P 500 指数跌势将愈演愈烈
item.description: 华尔街的交易员们在很多问题上意见不一，但有一个观点他们现在似乎是一致的：唐纳德-特朗普总统即将宣布的关税措施很可能会加剧 S&P 500 指数的下跌，至少在短期内是这样。【原文：Wall Street trading desks disagree on many things, but there’s one view they now seem to share: President Donald Trump’s looming tariff announcement will likely exacerbate the S&P 500 Index selloff, at least in the near term.】

item.title: 刚刚离开日本央行的前董事会成员认为有可能在五月加息
item.description: 一位刚刚结束任期的前日本央行董事会成员表示，鉴于日本通胀动态不断改善，除非美国关税引发全球市场动荡，否则央行可能会在下次政策会议上上调基准利率。【原文：A former Bank of Japan board member who just finished his term said that unless US tariffs trigger global market turmoil, the central bank could raise its benchmark rate at its next policy meeting, given Japan’s improving inflation dynamics.】

item.title: 贸易战迫使加拿大各省大量发行新债券
item.description: 贸易战将使加拿大各省陷入更深的赤字，重振信贷市场的沉睡一角。【原文：The trade war is set to plunge Canadian provinces into deeper deficits, revitalizing a sleepy corner of the credit market.】

item.title: 愚人节恶作剧出错，日本担心大米短缺
item.description: 日本的大米价格可不是闹着玩的，食品供应商 Hokka Hokka Tei 在本周二的愚人节恶作剧中就发现了这一点。【原文：Rice prices in Japan are no laughing matter, as food vendor Hokka Hokka Tei found on Tuesday when an April Fools’ prank went awry.】

item.title: 据称布鲁克菲尔德公司将重启有关 Grifols 潜在收购的谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，继去年收购西班牙血浆公司失败后，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）重新启动了与Grifols SA主要股东的谈判。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. has revived talks with Grifols SA’s main shareholder about a potential offer for the Spanish blood-plasma company following a failed attempt last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 2 月份中国电动汽车全球出口量同比下降 18% 至 92,625 辆
item.description: 中国海关的数据显示，2 月份中国对比利时的电动车出口量为 10105 辆，同比下降 41%，在所有国家或地区中降幅最大。【原文：China’s EV exports to Belgium in February fell 41% y/y to 10,105, the biggest decline among all nations or territories, according to data from China Customs.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡公司计划在未来几周内发行该国首只上市苏库克债券
item.description: 斯里兰卡可再生能源生产商维杜兰卡公司（Vidullanka Plc）正计划在未来几周内出售该国首只公开上市的苏库克债券，此前当地交易所曾努力启动伊斯兰金融市场。【原文：Sri Lankan renewable energy producer Vidullanka Plc is planning to sell the nation’s first publicly listed Sukuk bond in coming weeks after efforts by the local bourse to kick start an Islamic finance market.】

item.title: 毛里求斯寻求稳定卢比，重振证券交易所
item.description: 毛里求斯新政府在寻求重振陷入困境的证券交易所时，将优先采取稳定货币和吸引外国投资者的措施。【原文：The new government in Mauritius will prioritize measures to stabilize its currency and draw foreign investors as it seeks to revive its beleaguered stock exchange.】

item.title: 据说菲律宾贷款机构 Esquire Financing 正在考虑出售价值 10 亿美元的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Esquire Financing Inc. 的所有者正在考虑出售这家总部位于马尼拉的贷款公司的股份，并可能为该公司寻求高达 10 亿美元的估值。【原文：The owners of Esquire Financing Inc. are considering selling a stake in the Manila-based lender and could seek a valuation of as much as $1 billion for the company, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行旗下 DWS 就德国 "洗绿 "调查达成和解
item.description: 德意志银行股份公司（Deutsche Bank AG）的投资部门 DWS 就德国检察官对其涉嫌 "洗绿 "的长期调查达成和解。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s investment arm DWS settled a long-running investigation by German prosecutors into alleged greenwashing.】

item.title: BBVA 与 PGGM、Alecta 合作，将 ESG 相关风险转移规模扩大三倍
item.description: BBVA SA 将贷款组合的规模扩大两倍，这与与荷兰养老基金管理公司 PGGM 达成的重大风险转移协议有关，并引入瑞典养老金集团 Alecta 作为第二个投资者。【原文：BBVA SA is tripling the size of the loan portfolio linked to a significant risk transfer agreed with Dutch pension fund manager PGGM and bringing in Swedish pension group Alecta as a second investor.】

item.title: 一个供应链怪圈帮助印度航空公司获得了为中国航空公司制造的 50 架波音喷气机
item.description: 在新飞机普遍短缺的情况下，印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）大量购买 737 Max 喷气式飞机的计划即将结束。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s windfall of 737 Max jets amid a broader shortage of new planes is coming to an end.】

item.title: 投资者为至关重要的南非议会预算投票做好准备
item.description: 南非议会将对一项重要的预算立法进行投票表决，而联合政府中最大的两个党派之间为解决支出计划分歧而进行的谈判进展情况尚不明朗。【原文：South Africa’s parliament is set to vote on a key piece of budget legislation amid uncertainty about the status of talks between the coalition government’s two biggest parties to resolve their differences over the spending plan.】

item.title: 挪威维修和天气转凉导致欧洲天然气价格上涨
item.description: 由于天气转凉以及挪威一些最大的生产设施开始进行季节性维护，欧洲天然气价格连续第三天上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices advanced for a third day amid cooler weather and the start of seasonal maintenance at some of Norway’s biggest production facilities.】

item.title: 面对关税威胁，西班牙股市跑赢欧洲其他国家股市
item.description: 与欧洲同行相比，西班牙股票市场的 2025 年应该会更加光明，因为该国的金融和能源强国在一定程度上使其免受美国关税的威胁。【原文：The Spanish equity market should have a brighter 2025 than its European peers as the country’s financial and energy powerhouses partly shield it from the threat of US tariffs.】

item.title: Grifols 因报道布鲁克菲尔德重启交易谈判而取得进展
item.description: 据《El Confidencial》报道，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）已恢复与西班牙血浆公司 Grifols SA 的接触，双方可能就价值 70 亿欧元（约合 76 亿美元）的收购要约进行谈判。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. has resumed contacts with Spanish blood-plasma company Grifols SA on a possible offer that could be worth €7 billion ($7.6 billion) following a failed earlier attempt, El Confidencial reported.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行称欧洲央行批准将 BPM 股份增至 19.9
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）周三在一份新闻稿中称，欧洲中央银行已授权法国农业信贷银行将其在 Banco BPM SpA 的持股比例提高至 19.9%。【原文：The European Central Bank has authorized Credit Agricole SA to raise its stake in Banco BPM SpA stake up to 19.9%, the French lender said in a press release on Wednesday.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行将于 4 月 28 日启动 BPM 银行投标期
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 的股东将从 4 月底到 6 月底决定是否接受 UniCredit SpA 的收购要约，这标志着一项可能创建意大利最大银行的拟议交易进入了决定性阶段。【原文：Banco BPM SpA’s shareholders will have from the end of April until late June to decide if they want to accept UniCredit SpA’s takeover offer, marking the decisive period for a proposed deal that could create Italy’s largest bank.】

item.title: 印度科技初创企业总价值达 1000 亿美元，预计到 2027 年将寻求 IPO
item.description: 印度互联网公司的顶级交易顾问之一表示，到 2027 年，印度将有三十多家估值合计达 1000 亿美元的科技初创公司上市，这将标志着印度股票销售的反弹。【原文：More than three dozen tech startups with a combined valuation of $100 billion are set to go public by 2027 in what would mark a rebound in stock sales in India, according to one of the country’s top deal advisers to internet companies.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数：特朗普关税阴影笼罩，英国股市将下滑
A.P. Moller Holding 将以 13 亿美元收购 Svitzer
item.description: 丹麦 A.P. Moller Holding A/S公司提出全现金收购 Svitzer Group A/S，交易对这家海事服务提供商的估值约为90亿克朗（13亿美元）。【原文：Denmark’s A.P. Moller Holding A/S made an all-cash offer to acquire Svitzer Group A/S in a deal valuing the marine services provider at about 9 billion kroner ($1.3 billion).】

item.title: 尼日利亚聘请壳牌集团前首席执行官领导国有石油公司
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）任命壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）一个部门的前负责人管理国家石油公司，因为这个非洲最大的原油生产国正在努力提高产量并恢复当地的炼油能力。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu appointed the former head of a unit of Shell Plc to run the state oil company, as Africa’s biggest crude producer works to boost output and revive local refining capacity.】

item.title: 关税临近，越南将派副总理最后一刻出访美国
item.description: 越南计划于本周末向美国派出另一个高级官员和商业代表团，这表明，在全球为唐纳德-特朗普推出互惠关税做准备之际，正在发生着激烈的幕后活动。【原文：Vietnam plans to send another top official and business delegation to the US this weekend in a sign of the furious behind-the-scenes activity taking place as the world braces for Donald Trump’s rollout of reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 中国在最后的关税上诉中为美国争取贸易利益
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）预计宣布新的全球关税前夕，中国在执政党共产党的官方报纸上强调美国农民和科技公司是经济关系的受益者，这显然是在呼吁为贸易紧张局势降温。【原文：China highlighted US farmers and tech companies as beneficiaries of economic ties in the ruling Communist Party’s official newspaper, in an apparent appeal to cool trade tensions on the eve of Donald Trump’s expected announcement of new global tariffs.】
